name.str: Hologram Projector - Locator of Automated Compliance Center

description: This is a hologram projector which generates an interactive hologram when you activate it. Hologram can talk to you, answer some of your questions, but most importantly, it can locate Automated Compliance Center

use_action.summon_msg: Hologram appears in front of you!

description: This is a hologram projector which generates an interactive hologram when you activate it. Hologram can talk to you, answer some of your questions, but most importantly, it can locate XEDRA Black Site
